description: This file defines a LightningJS component named 'Home' using the Blits framework. It includes component imports, a template with UI elements, state management, lifecycle hooks, and methods for animations and interactions.

classes.name: Home
classes.description: A LightningJS component representing the home page with animated logo, loader, and button.

methods.name: rotateColors
methods.description: Method to rotate the loader's color periodically.
